title: Contert Editor & Web Developer
description: At Spletna Postaja, Iâ€™ve been responsible for editing and maintaining websites and online stores using October CMS. title: Web Developer
description: During my internship at PC7, I worked on creating,managing and updating WordPress websites and e-commerce platforms. I created website for rating AI tools and e-commerce platform selling beauty products. I also gained hands-on experience with Laravel, which gave me a deeper understanding of modern web development practices. On top of that, I contributed to the testing and improvement of an AI-driven application for file communication, where I helped ensure smooth functionality and usability.

title: Electrician
description: At Elektromonter, I first started by assembling the frames of electrical cabinets, focusing on the basic structure and preparation work. After a few months, I progressed to independently wiring entire cabinets according to technical plans. This step-by-step growth gave me valuable hands-on experience, improved my precision, and strengthened my ability to follow detailed electrical schematics with confidence.

company: Bambus parketi in terase d.o.o. | Part-time
title: Warehouse Worker
description: My role at Bambus Parketi was focused on preparing and packaging customer orders in the warehouse. I learned the importance of efficiency, organization, and accuracy when handling products and coordinating shipments. While not directly related to IT, this job helped me build a strong work ethic and taught me how to manage time effectively in a busy, hands-on environment.
